extendedInfo.description: Read BBC News and BBC Sport even when you're not connected to the network.  For example, when you're on the tube or on a plane.Choose the categories you're interested in (from World or UK Editions) and schedule background updates.Includes the following news categories:â¢ Africaâ¢ Asia-Pacificâ¢ Europeâ¢ Latin Americaâ¢ Middle Eastâ¢ South Asiaâ¢ US & Canadaâ¢ UKâ¢ Businessâ¢ Economyâ¢ Healthâ¢ Science & Environmentâ¢ Technologyâ¢ Entertainment & ArtsUK Edition also includes:â¢ Worldâ¢ Englandâ¢ Northern Irelandâ¢ Scotlandâ¢ Walesâ¢ Education & Familyâ¢ PoliticsSport categories include:â¢ Football (Soccer)â¢ Formula 1 (F1)â¢ Cricketâ¢ Rugbyâ¢ Tennisâ¢ Golfâ¢ and many moreContent is from BBC News and BBC Sport. This news reader is not affiliated to the BBC.Please report problems via the developer's web page.

reviews.title: Solid...
reviews.comment: ... reliable, no frills.  Does exactly what it says on the tin.  Have been using in place of the BBC\'s equivalent app and haven\'t missed it.  Recommended
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Must have app
reviews.comment: This app allow you to download the bbc content which you want to read. I have found it greet for traveling and holiday. I the next update you should allow people to download news from your football team and not just all the prem.
reviews.author: Dom Evans

reviews.title: Whats happened...
reviews.comment: ....unable to update, please try later!!....happens every time!...please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well - great for travelling.
reviews.comment: The BBC app is good too but useless of you have no signal.
reviews.author: Quinn Fissler

reviews.title: The best way to view BBC news
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried the official app, and many others that use the BBC news feed, and this is by far the best. Great to be able to read the articles even when you don\'t have internet access. Update 15/Aug13. Been using this app for a few weeks now, and really good. The only issues I\'ve are with photos wrongly positioned, or missing completely.
reviews.author: Simon Roffey

reviews.comment: Unable to update stories?!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Small, fast, reliable.
reviews.author: Leo K

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Says package is invalid
reviews.author: Malcolm Cowan

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: As of today app is no longer updating. Shame - it was one of my favourite apps.  Please fix it - otherwise I will have to uninstall. 2 Oct - developer has fixed updating problem so it\'s now back to being the great app it always used to be
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I use it every day
reviews.comment: Accidental swipe was a problem. Thanks for fixing it. Why bother with a delete button?  The update stories deletes the old ones just fine.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Spot On!
reviews.comment: This app has replaced the official BBC News app on my Note 2 now. It works and looks superb. Black background is much easier on the eyes. No wonder people are rating with 5 stars. I\'d gladly pay for this app Well done and thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Minor bug
reviews.comment: Dark theme makes stories text change to white but the backround stays white, so just a white screen. 5 stars as I suspect it will be resolved shortly. Edit: Dev trying to resolve issue through his webpage comments, great support for a free app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shows wrong stories
reviews.comment: Whenever i click a story a different report is displayed. Pretty useless until fixed. Galaxy S2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Updates working again in 2.4.
reviews.comment: All working properly again now for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fantastic. No frills newsreader. Great stuff. Thanks dev!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super App
reviews.comment: Spot on
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect for me
reviews.comment: Best bbc news app with so much more than the official one. Highly recomended. One request though is to have it install to SD card instead of the internal memory, as on most Android phones, space there is limited.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Works fine & keeps it simple, just as it should be. App has a tiny memory footprint so is perfect on older phones that have limited internal memory. By using mobile version of BBC News, it keeps data use as low as is possible. Only annoyance is that sometimes \"update all now\" doesn\'t start working for a minute or so, but if I then go into the first news category and select \"update now\" it starts the whole update of all categories immediately.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works Great On Wildfire
reviews.comment: A great app. In one sense very simplistic, but that is what makes it so easy to use and to adapt to individual preferences for the news topic areas that interest each individual. Been using for over a year now and only experienced a few glitches; all of which have been fixed by the developer quickly. Thanks for developing the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than bbc
reviews.comment: I have a galaxy Note, and it fits the screen nicely unlike the BBC mobile app.
reviews.author: A Google User
